name: tenki-clone
description: Kompletny klon platformy Tenki Cloud - GitHub Actions runners alternative

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed

author: Artur Wyroslak
